articles.description: Oscar Piastri leads Lando Norris to a McLaren one-two at the Spanish Grand Prix with Red Bull's Max Verstappen handed a 10-second penalty after late controversy.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2025: Oscar Piastri wins as Max Verstappen handed 10-second penalty for causing a collision

articles.description: Britain's Simon Yates secures his first Giro d'Italia title as his Visma-Lease a Bike team-mate Olav Kooij sprints to victory on the final stage in Rome.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Simon Yates seals first title as Olav Kooij sprints to victory in final stage in Rome

articles.description: Paris St-Germain's players celebrate their Champions League victory in the French capital, hours after trouble across France in which two people died.
articles.title: PSG celebrate Champions League victory with open-top bus parade in Paris

articles.title: The spark to reinvigorate Man Utd? How Cunha fits Amorim's plans

articles.title: French Open 2025 LIVE: Swiatek vs Rybakina - scores, results & order of play at Roland Garros

articles.description: As Paris St-Germain celebrate being crowned champions of Europe, is the new-look Champions League a European Super League in all but name?
articles.title: Champions League: A new winner, but is competition now a Super League by default?

articles.description: Defending champion Iga Swiatek battles back from a disastrous start to beat Elena Rybakina 1-6 6-3 7-5 and reach the French Open quarter-finals, where she will play Elina Svitolina who upset fourth seed Jasmine Paolini.
articles.title: French Open 2025 results: Iga Swiatek recovers from disastrous start to beat Elene Rybakina

articles.title: How much will each Premier League club have to spend on transfers this summer?

articles.description: The Indiana Pacers reach the NBA Finals for the first time since 2000 after beating the New York Knicks 125-108 in game six of the Eastern Conference finals.
articles.title: NBA: Indiana Pacers reach NBA Finals after beating New York Knicks in Game 6
